Comment.Text: Overview This scenario trains the Common Spatial Pattern spatial filter that will be used in the further steps. The EEG signal is filtered in a large frequency band [8-30 Hz]. Then the Stimulation based epoching boxes provide examples for the CSP Spatial Filter Trainer : class 1: LEFT trials class 2: RIGHT trials At the end of the training process, the CSP trainer outputs the stimulation OVTK_StimulationId_TrainCompleted on success, telling the Player Controller to pause the scenario.
